Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationships of fowlicidin-1, a cathelicidin antimicrobial peptide in chicken
Literature.Author: Xiao Y, Dai H, Bommineni YR, Soulages JL, Gong YX, Prakash O, Zhang G

Literature.Title: The design of a cell-selective fowlicidin-1-derived peptide with both antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory activities.
Literature.Author: Rajasekaran G, Kumar SD, Yang S, Shin SY

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>360 µM,Madin-Darby canine kidney cells:50% Cell death=159 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=240 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2.8µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MIC=5.6µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=2.8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=5.6µM),Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=16µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=16µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=2µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(no activity data)
